display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                        
[media]
# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

[media]
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

[media]
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

[media]
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

[media]
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.

# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982499_874210870844905_8266732701765703080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=sVJh7ooWqGoQ7kNvwGlX6IV&_nc_oc=Admjv6Qk0LbZc_9zjcac9DoIuOn33NdEzH66Up2-1eCkWXv1GU6Oes_t1x7tIh5WvI4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cm8m0ZdJgW-XBrGI3hwzhw&oh=00_AftsVf1P4mPBPSD-f3PYs94pHDzRXPC7dBzHO3JRzkn2Gw&oe=69869B09)
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982581_1223888319033072_3959488854512735737_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=StGLVBUW9VQQ7kNvwFU85NC&_nc_oc=AdnvEUcUk1HD9e02lMRR2KwVBmOx6f99vOObl-hsC2icak443Kn2h18wWMcqmVTfgMk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cm8m0ZdJgW-XBrGI3hwzhw&oh=00_AfvUgUMKfqJY1e98bvl78gA53FmvC6nARpo6_jrmS_345w&oe=6986701D)
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974548_1040387177540093_112250259871580574_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=9mYyDeY03SAQ7kNvwHcnlsz&_nc_oc=Adk0HS3dpwBU51kI8N0-UnXI8KZ2qHrpwfRqu0OdPQnVJEazuRVGoBdGFgT0Y77Fafc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cm8m0ZdJgW-XBrGI3hwzhw&oh=00_AfvzwBdEdViiz6Fmtjo5lScepRQolDlGYr-W78zhG-yuYQ&oe=69869612)
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974628_1432121104166417_7819473213702105902_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=pivaD6B0iZIQ7kNvwGN1vzT&_nc_oc=AdnXkAJ5uN3E5PfvUrqANPp3yHhcM_kFmfMhQsIPThUpDyc8RkQRXvpzAx6SWl8K40o&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cm8m0ZdJgW-XBrGI3hwzhw&oh=00_Afsm-zLQQE870Y_0diLkUKA8J2BLE9yFQtIFortgUjM9hA&oe=69867802)
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.
